charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE; 21 USC 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)(iii); 18 USC 3551 et seq. On or about January 29, 2002, the defendant did knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute 5 grams or more of a substance containing cocaine base. (1)

21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE; 21 USC 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)(iii); 18 USC 3551 et seq. On or about February 5, 2002, the defendant did knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute 5 grams or more of a substance containing cocaine base. (2)

21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE; 21 USC 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)(iii); 18 USC 3551 et seq. On or about February 11, 2002, the defendant did knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute 5 grams or more of a substance containing cocaine base. (3)

18:922G.F UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC.; 18 USC 922(g)(1), 924(a)(2) and 3551 et seq. On or about June 18, 2002, the defendant did knowingly and intentionally possess in and affecting commerce a firearm, to wit: a 9mm Highpoint semi-automatic handgun. (4)
Title 21 USC Section 846. Conspiracy to distribute and possess with intent to distribute cocaine and cocaine base. [2:02-m-927]
